In England, in the seven days to 29 November, there were 254,834 new confirmed cases (450.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 November, there were 245,873 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 4% (8,961 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 December is 8,841,194 (15,634.3 cases per 100,000 population).
